description:
Rito, Haruna, and Lala are moving up in the universe, when an alien prince visits and they each become Ambassadors of Peace from the Earth.  They get more than just their titles, but a challenge to compete for the title of Greatest Hunter in the Universe.  This could be a big opportunity for Rito in reaching his goal of become the greatest man, so they compete.  After an adventure filled with dinosaurs and giant gorillas, Haruna wins the title, while Rito finds a group of Amazons who want to all marry him.
Source: crunchyroll
